mapper.sql: select no, sal_id, psn, buy_id, buy_nick, contents, reviewStar, r_date, m_date, ur_state, ad_state, first_date, first_id, last_date, last_id from review_comment
mapper.select: where sal_id = #{sal_id} order by r_date desc, no desc
mapper.insert: insert into review_comment (sal_id, buy_id, buy_nick, contents,reviewStar,first_date,first_id,last_date,last_id) values (#{sal_id},#{buy_id},#{buy_nick},#{contents},#{reviewStar},now(),#{buy_id},now(),#{buy_id})
mapper.delete: delete from review_comment where buy_id = #{buy_id} and no = #{no}
